sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Elsewhere, Ukrainians celebrate as best they can. In Odessa, a cathedral was decorated with Christmas trees and a nativity scene.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, in Lviv, people take part in a Christmas Eve procession.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A drone launched from Iran struck a chemical tanker in the Indian Ocean early on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The attack follows multiple assaults on commercial ships in the Red Sea recently by Iran-backed Houthi rebels in Yemen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They are targeting Western ships with links to Israel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But this appears to be the first attack on a commercial vessel outside of the Red Sea since the beginning of the Israel-Hamas war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Pentagon said the tanker was Liberia-flagged, Japanese-owned and Netherlands-operated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Iran denied involvement in Saturday's drone attack, saying the country doesn't have any proxy groups in the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It also denied involvement in attacks against vessels in the Red Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: in the region. It also denied involvement in attacks against vessels in the Red Sea. The attacks on commercial ships have forced them to re-route. Delays on goods and rising prices are expected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Wind gusts reached 215 km an hour in northwestern Italy, tearing off roofs of houses and farms and bringing down trees.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The gusts of wind have been ongoing since Saturday, especially affecting the province of Turin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The warm, thorn wind coming from the Alps has led to a rise in temperatures throughout northern Italy, with peaks of over 20 degrees between Turin and Milan. The situation of emergency is set to last for at least the whole day.
